Audio.Locality: Arauca, Tame, Vda. Sabanas de la Vieja, Predio El Oso
Audio.Author: Orlando A. Acevedo-Charry
Audio.Comments: N 06°23.045', W71°55.576', 788 m. A single individual over a Cecropia sp. tree, in a forest gap. The bird was 20-25 m of the soil, and more or less 30 m of the Mic. Recorder: Marantz PMD 620, external Mic: shotgun Sennheiser ME-66bird-seen:yesplayback-used:no
